title: Greetings and Introductions
objectives: Learn basic greetings and self-introduction phrases.

title: Family Members Vocabulary
objectives: Learn to name and describe family members.

title: Daily Routine Phrases
objectives: Learn phrases for describing your daily routine.

title: Common Household Items
objectives: Identify and name common items at home.

title: Week 1 Review: Greetings & Family
prompt: Ask the learner to introduce themselves and talk about their family in English. Give feedback and encouragement.
objectives: Review greetings, introductions, and family vocabulary.

title: Shopping Vocabulary
objectives: Learn words and phrases for shopping.

title: Fruits and Vegetables
objectives: Learn names of fruits and vegetables in English.

title: Kitchen Actions & Utensils
objectives: Learn verbs and utensils used in the kitchen.

title: Cooking a Simple Recipe
objectives: Watch and understand a simple cooking demonstration in English.

title: Week 2 Review: Shopping & Cooking
prompt: Ask the learner to describe a shopping trip and a simple recipe in English. Give feedback and encouragement.
objectives: Review shopping and cooking vocabulary.

title: Public Transport Vocabulary
objectives: Learn words and phrases for using buses and autos.

title: Asking for Directions
objectives: Learn how to ask and give directions in English.

title: At the Doctor's Clinic
objectives: Learn phrases for visiting a doctor and describing symptoms.

title: Health and Wellness
objectives: Learn vocabulary for health and wellness.

title: Week 3 Review: Transport & Health
prompt: Ask the learner to describe a bus journey and a doctor's visit in English. Give feedback and encouragement.
objectives: Review transport and health vocabulary.

title: Banking and Money
objectives: Learn words and phrases for banking and handling money.

title: Making Phone Calls
objectives: Learn how to make and receive phone calls in English.

title: School and Education
objectives: Learn vocabulary for school and talking to teachers.

title: Talking to Neighbors
objectives: Learn phrases for friendly neighbor conversations.

title: Week 4 Review: Money, Phone, School
prompt: Ask the learner to roleplay a phone call and a school conversation in English. Give feedback and encouragement.
objectives: Review money, phone, and school vocabulary.

title: Restaurant and Food Vocabulary
objectives: Learn words and phrases for eating out and ordering food.

title: Shopping for Clothes
objectives: Learn vocabulary for shopping for clothes and accessories.

title: Describing Weather
objectives: Learn to describe weather and seasons in English.

title: Road Safety and Traffic Signs
objectives: Learn about road safety and understanding traffic signs.

title: Week 5 Review: Food, Shopping, Weather
prompt: Ask the learner to describe a restaurant visit and talk about the weather in English. Give feedback and encouragement.
objectives: Review food, shopping, and weather vocabulary.

title: Festivals and Celebrations
objectives: Learn vocabulary for festivals and celebrations.

title: Describing Hobbies
objectives: Learn to talk about hobbies and interests in English.

title: Simple Conversations at Home
objectives: Watch and understand simple home conversations in English.

title: Public Places Vocabulary
objectives: Learn vocabulary for public places like parks, markets, and hospitals.

title: Week 6 Review: Festivals, Hobbies, Public Places
prompt: Ask the learner to talk about a festival and describe a public place in English. Give feedback and encouragement.
objectives: Review festivals, hobbies, and public places vocabulary.

title: Roleplay: Shopping for Groceries
prompt: Practice a conversation at a grocery store. Ask for items, prices, and quantities in English.
objectives: Practice shopping for groceries in English.

title: Grocery Shopping in English
objectives: Watch a real-life grocery shopping conversation in English.

title: Roleplay: Asking for Directions
prompt: Practice asking and giving directions in English. Use common landmarks and phrases.
objectives: Practice giving and receiving directions in English.

title: Directions and Landmarks
objectives: Learn about common landmarks and how to describe them in English.

title: Week 7 Review: Shopping & Directions
prompt: Ask the learner to roleplay a shopping and directions conversation in English. Give feedback and encouragement.
objectives: Review shopping and directions vocabulary.

title: Roleplay: At the Doctor's
prompt: Practice a conversation with a doctor. Describe symptoms and ask for advice in English.
objectives: Practice talking to a doctor in English.

title: Doctor-Patient Conversations
objectives: Watch a doctor-patient conversation in English.

title: Roleplay: Talking to a Teacher
prompt: Practice a conversation with a teacher about your child's progress in English.
objectives: Practice talking to teachers in English.

title: Parent-Teacher Meetings
objectives: Learn about parent-teacher meetings and common phrases used.

title: Week 8 Review: Health & School
prompt: Ask the learner to roleplay a doctor's visit and a parent-teacher meeting in English. Give feedback and encouragement.
objectives: Review health and school vocabulary.

title: Roleplay: At a Restaurant
prompt: Practice ordering food and asking about dishes in English.
objectives: Practice restaurant conversations in English.

title: Ordering Food in English
objectives: Watch a restaurant ordering conversation in English.

title: Roleplay: Talking to a Neighbor
prompt: Practice a friendly conversation with a neighbor in English.
objectives: Practice neighborly conversations in English.

title: Friendly Conversations
objectives: Learn about friendly conversations and small talk in English.

title: Week 9 Review: Restaurant & Neighbors
prompt: Ask the learner to roleplay a restaurant and neighbor conversation in English. Give feedback and encouragement.
objectives: Review restaurant and neighbor vocabulary.

title: Roleplay: At the Bank
prompt: Practice a conversation at the bank. Ask about deposits, withdrawals, and account information in English.
objectives: Practice banking conversations in English.

title: Banking in English
objectives: Learn about banking and money-related conversations in English.

title: Roleplay: Emergency Situations
prompt: Practice asking for help in emergencies in English.
objectives: Practice emergency conversations in English.

title: Emergency English
objectives: Learn about emergency situations and vocabulary in English.

title: Week 10 Review: Bank & Emergency
prompt: Ask the learner to roleplay a bank and emergency conversation in English. Give feedback and encouragement.
objectives: Review bank and emergency vocabulary.

title: Roleplay: Public Speaking
prompt: Practice introducing yourself and speaking in front of a group in English.
objectives: Practice public speaking in English.

title: Public Speaking Skills
objectives: Learn about public speaking and presentation skills in English.

title: Roleplay: Expressing Opinions
prompt: Practice expressing your opinion and preferences in English.
objectives: Practice expressing opinions in English.

title: Expressing Feelings in English
objectives: Learn about expressing feelings and emotions in English.

title: Week 11 Review: Speaking & Opinions
prompt: Ask the learner to roleplay a public speaking and opinion conversation in English. Give feedback and encouragement.
objectives: Review public speaking and opinion vocabulary.

title: Roleplay: Welcoming Guests
prompt: Practice welcoming guests and making them comfortable in English.
objectives: Practice hospitality and welcoming in English.

title: Hospitality in English
objectives: Learn about hospitality and welcoming guests in English.

title: Roleplay: Final Conversation
prompt: Practice a conversation covering all major topics learned so far in English.
objectives: Practice a comprehensive conversation in English.

title: English Recap & Motivation
objectives: Recap all major topics and motivate continued learning.

title: Final Review & Congratulations!
prompt: Ask the learner to reflect on their learning journey and practice a final conversation in English. Celebrate their progress!
objectives: Comprehensive review and celebration of the learning journey.
